Hi! My name is Elise! I use she/her pronouns and I FUCKING LOVE WOMEN.

You all have permission to randomly message me about Pokemon or Earthbound.

summary: Fun thing cause I wanna

Fun thing cause I wanna

Send me a Pokémon and I’ll give you a reason I love that funky mans. I love those little bastards

OR send me your story of why YOU love a Pokémon!

summary: if pokemon is the highest grossing media franchise of all time then why are pokemon fans taking shots at marvel even if it’s...
body: if pokemon is the highest grossing media franchise of all time then why are pokemon fans taking shots at marvel even if it’s nowhere near it in rankings? specifically why are some of them specifically taking shots at captain marvel? like can someone rationalize this without being sexist?

reblog.comment: if pokemon is the highest grossing media franchise of all time then why are pokemon fans taking shots at marvel even if it’s nowhere near it in rankings? specifically why are some of them specifically taking shots at captain marvel? like can someone rationalize this without being sexist?

summary: Ampeil (idk if I spelt it right) would be Pikachu 👉👉👉
question: Ampeil (idk if I spelt it right) would be Pikachu 👉👉👉
answer:
See! that’s good! but for me i stuck with all water/fish pokemon

For me, my method is ‘Do they look like the Subnautica fish?” and if not “Will they fit in place of it, through the actions they do?”

reblog.comment:
See! that’s good! but for me i stuck with all water/fish pokemon

For me, my method is ‘Do they look like the Subnautica fish?” and if not “Will they fit in place of it, through the actions they do?”

blog.name: pokemon-plush-rescue
blog.title: Pokemon Plushie Rescue
blog.description: Over the years I've rescued a lot of Pokemon plushies from thrift stores and yard sales, and I put this blog together to catalog my different Pokemon rescues, as well as the other Pokemon plushies that have come into my life that never cease to make me smile. With the success of Dr. Sword's recovery post on my main blog, I'd figure this would also be an interesting place to have

summary: This is Voldemort the Vaporeon. I rescued him from a bag of stuff at a thrift store, and actually laughed a little when I...
caption: This is Voldemort the Vaporeon. I rescued him from a bag of stuff at a thrift store, and actually laughed a little when I realized he had no nose, not even a little nub like vaporeons tend to have. His lack of nose landed him the name Voldemort, and I have few regrets. He may be slightly defective, but we welcome all sorts of defects into this Pokefamily, and now he lives happily amongst some of my other Eeveelution plushies

reblog.comment: This is Voldemort the Vaporeon. I rescued him from a bag of stuff at a thrift store, and actually laughed a little when I realized he had no nose, not even a little nub like vaporeons tend to have. His lack of nose landed him the name Voldemort, and I have few regrets. He may be slightly defective, but we welcome all sorts of defects into this Pokefamily, and now he lives happily amongst some of my other Eeveelution plushies

He may be slightly defective, but we welcome all sorts of defects into this Pokefamily, and now he lives happily amongst some of my other Eeveelution plushies

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Arcatina Origin Arceus and Giratina Origin fusion Normal/Ghost Type Ability: World’s End - Normal and Ghost Type moves gain an...
caption:
Arcatina Origin

Arceus and Giratina Origin fusion

Normal/Ghost Type

Ability: World’s End - Normal and Ghost Type moves gain an additional 25% power boost and have a 25% chance to inflict curse onto the opponent.

Stats: HP - 130, Atk - 125, Def - 140, SpA - 125, Def - 140, Spe - 130

The Chaos Pokemon

This fusion has only been seen once by ancient people.  In order to stop a powerful force, Arceus fused with Giratina and dragged its opponent into the distortion world to eradicate it from existence.  When fighting, it will use the power of shadows to send its opponent into the distortion world.  This fusion is quite unstable. 

Request for anon. I hope you like it!

blog.title: The Game of Nerds
blog.description: Are you obsessed with a fandom, show, movie, or book?  Then you are at the right place!

summary: 'Detective Pikachu': A Case of Marketing Mayhem
title: 'Detective Pikachu': A Case of Marketing Mayhem
body:
Have you seen Detective Pikachu yet?

*Spoilers Ahead!*

Hey trainers! Are you feeling emotionally confused by Detective Pikachu? You’re not alone! Just what Detective Pikachu was meant to achieve is a bigger mystery than anything put forth by the film, so if you want some answers, look no further!

When I first heard that they were (FINALLY) developing a live-action Pokémon movie my immediate reaction was “I’m excited but also very,…

View On WordPress
